data.name: Alice
data.text: 后面很容易因为饿吃太多

data.name: Bob
data.text: 吃早餐会促进运动中的能量燃烧https://www.technologynetworks.com/applied-sciences/news/breakfast-could-prime-the-body-to-burn-carbs-in-exercise-307732?utm_campaign=Newsletter_TN_BreakingScienceNews&utm_source=hs_email&utm_medium=email&utm_content=65269204&_hsenc=p2ANqtz-9V9tgpQ1rTG94tG1pi963tpx1hhOqW15f_fvhhOM7eBvkuywgXZU8BZIlB2WoLZuyem1MBJjQ2PvghSLCpv-bEfThTWg&_hsmi=65269206

data.name: Bob
data.text:
还有研究表明早餐可以减少胃肽(一种增加饥饿感的激素)的含量。
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/22178258/

post.text: 不吃早餐为什么会胖 我醒来都十点了
